text:
[Verse]
Sunrise paints the sky
Colors dancing high
Ocean whispers near
New day's light is clear

[Verse 2]
Footprints in the sand
Holding tight your hand
Cool breeze in the air
Memories we share

[Chorus]
Waves on the shore
Wanting more
Endless dreams
Life's it seems

[Verse 3]
Shells upon the beach
Future within reach
Seagulls flying free
Joy for you and me

[Verse 4]
Stars begin to show
Moonlight’s gentle glow
Heartbeats soft and slow
Love's the path we know

[Chorus]
Waves on the shore
Wanting more
Endless dreams
Life's it seems
title: Waves on the Shore
